articles.title: Heat wave: Punjab govt prepones summer vacations for govt schools
articles.description: As per the latest now order, now summer vacations for all students in government schools will commence from May 15 till June 30.
articles.content: With sweltering heat continuing in the state, Punjab government Friday ordered change in timings for government school students and also announced preponing of summer vacations.
